text: Keho Anumzamo'ma neramia knazamo'ma tagripima asunku'za erifore nehuno, tamazeri o'netigeta kazigazi huta tamagra'a tamazeri ama nehuta, antahi haviza nehuta, tamagu'afi kore nehuta, nagri'ma nagezankura tusiza huno tamavenesigeta, hanavetita havizama hu'nea vahera zamazeri fatgo nehuta, maka'zama hanafina fatgo zanke'za nehaze.
